result.eng: It happened at the end of the last century.

result.eng: Am I the last person?

result.eng: Did you go out last night?

result.eng: Communism was on its last legs in 1989.
result.ga: bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989
result.orig: bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989

result.eng: I had a dream last night.

result.html: bhí brionglóid agam aréirI had a dream last night.

result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: There was a big crowd in the pub last night.

result.eng: It rained last night.

result.eng: The project was finished at long last in 2004.

result.eng: It was published last year.

result.eng: I wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.eng: There will be a special edition, the last show of the season.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.eng: Rome is lovely. I was there last year.

result.eng: This was the last operation of its kind we will see.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.

result.eng: That was the last I saw of them.
